Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rousch
Reviews.Content: very good and easy to use --IT IS NOT A GAMING MACHINE--the wife loves to use it for internet and causual gamingproblems are 1)VERY short battery life--2 hours  2) gets hot fast  3) did not come with a restore cd (made one as soon as it was hooked up)  4) came with windows 7 (not xp) (not really a bad thing )

Reviews.Title: Possitive Gift
Reviews.Author: Laura M. Forgue "sml128"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these as gifts for my children for Christmas. They arrived quickly and were in good shape. I appreciated the help I received when I called the company asking for a referral to what laptop would be appropriate. The man I spoke to took the time to help me.

Reviews.Title: Terrific service and help
Reviews.Author: John D. Kieser
Reviews.Content: I purchased a refurbished Dell Lattitude D630 from Tampa in July of 2012.  It came very quickly and I was pleased that the computer was better than advertised. It came with windows 7, a larger hard drive and a RW DVD drive - all of which were not part of the deal.  After making the mistake of installing McAfee (which caused all sorts of conflicts)and then uninstalling it and restoring the computer, all was great.  Then in the early days of September, a bizarre problem occured where the display starting tiling in two columns miniature images of the desktop.  Occasionally, it would boot up correctly but not often.  The folks at Tampa happily replaced the computer for me but saved the hard drive from the defective unit which saved me hours of rebuilding the unit.  And did this exchange in a week. Top marks for these folks!

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D630 14.1" Laptop
Reviews.Author: JuanCarlosGomez
Reviews.Content: I bought this Laptop D630, 14.1 inches, because I needed a small computer to take on my trips. It worked for about one week, then it gouldn't turn on! Also, it was creating so much heat coming out from the CPU heat sink. Since I'm a technician, I made some repair on it, chainging 3 SMD Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitors (Aluminum body devices located around the heat sink) and replacing the CPU heat sink thermal grease, applying new  "Arctic Silver 5 3.5G Polysynthetic Silver Thermal Grease Compound" to CPU Heat Sink. Now it works fine again.

Reviews.Title: d630 refurbished-Tampa Laptop
Reviews.Author: Columbus Adam
Reviews.Content: I bought this inexpensive laptop from Tampa Laptops thinking i was getting a great deal on a Christmas gift for my 7 year old .  the computer works and had fresh install of XP pro. the wifi has shut itself down a few times and has required a reboot, that is a little annoying.  i purchased this d630 that was listed as 'refurbished' and 'great condition' for $5 more than the 'used' one in 'good condition' thinking they would give me the pick of the litter, i would hate to see the 'used' one. there are a few buttons that the letters are half gone and the computer itself is filthy.  i would expect this computer had i chose the 'used' d630. as a refurb in 'great condition' i expect every component to be 'like new'  and gone through and cleaned, not just a fresh install of the operating system.  what do you get with the used one?  do you get someone's old virus riddled pos? had i known that i would have just bought the used one for 5 bucks less and refurb it myself.  what a joke.  also seller stated item would ship with in 2 days, it took 3 not a big deal.  item was to be shipped ups and came usps in a destroyed box. buyer bewareItems Ordered Price1 of: Dell Latitude D630 Laptop Core 2 Duo Dual Core 2.0ghz, 2gb Ram, 80gb Hdd, DVD Player, Windows Xp Pro Installed and Restore CdCondition: RefurbishedSold by: Tampa-Laptops (seller profile)$199.95

Reviews.Title: Dell Latiltude D630
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: This may be reconditioned but it is hard to tell by looking at it, just a slight mark or two on the cover. It has good enough speed for my purposes, which is mainly surfing the net with a little consulting. It comes without instructions but is easy to figure out. I've been using a Mac for several years and still intend to use it most of the time so I've been finding out, to my regret, about security issues as malware infected this computer before I could put safety measures in place, not the computers fault just my ignorance of the need for care with Windows.

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: KOC MUNDO
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure used laptop would be working okay, but i am glad i gave this one a chance. i am loving the quality of speed & stability.I liked this laptop, but it feels like screen makes my eyes to be exhausted than other laptops.Used Month: probably more than 4-6 Months.

Reviews.Title: Dell refurb
Reviews.Author: Donna L
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have bought a refurbished product. I must say this laptop has by far exceeded ALL my expectations. Has been running like a dream ever since the first boot up. No glitches, no unnecessary software packages clogging up the hard drive. :) Only one very minor flaw on the case.I have to send kudos along to Florida Laptops. I'm super impressed with them. The laptop arrived in a well padded package, right on schedule. Have been recommending them to friends and will definately look them up again the next time I need a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D630
Reviews.Author: gwarren
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop for the money.  I usually us Mac computers but needed a laptop for one program my company uses.  It was cheaper and more efficient to buy this laptop than try and put something on my Mac to run it.  Great product and well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Better Late than Never
Reviews.Author: attapats
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Dell Latitude for my daughter for use at college. When it arrived it had apparently been damaged in shipping - but I didn't know enough to know that. It didn't help me that I started working with it on a Friday night and Tampa-Laptops was not open on the weekend, nor are they open after 5pm Eastern time.  Since I work full-time it was difficult to connect with the supplier to help me determine what the problem was. It worked sometimes and sometimes would lock up or shut down.  Then it started working so I loaded software - but then it really locked up. My daughter was really disappointed.  I have a friend who is a Dell Engineer who helped me find out how to diagnose the problem which ended up being a hard drive issue.  I did return it to Tampa-Laptops who either fixed it or replaced the hard drive.  Even though I asked them I'm still not clear what they did.  I received this computer yesterday, about a month after my initial purchase, and it booted right up and appears to be running well so far.  It is an older model and does heat up quite a bit compared to my newer HP but for the price it seems to work well and the display is very crisp.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D630
Reviews.Author: Woodman
Reviews.Content: Unit was shipped as stated.  It shows signs of wear on the touch pad but overall was in ok shape.  It performs well but will lock up from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Bought from Tampa-Laptops - Perfect Deal!
Reviews.Author: Mouser "The Chinchilla Guerilla"
Reviews.Content: The laptop arrived a day early and was in near-perfect condition (described as very good condition by Tampa_Laptops, it truly was), and packed perfectly. It's inexpensive, not that heavy, and performs wonderfully. I bought it with Windows XP SP3 (I like a stable OS so screw Vista, 7,8, or 9) and it came with good software. The powercord was in great condition, the battery has full life with each charge, and they included a system restore disk.I installed my own preferred software with no problems. It does run a little warm when using flash applications such as some online games, but the fan works well. The speakers are good, the wifi and bluetooth work well, and I have yet to experience any problems. When it comes time to upgrade or purchase an additional computer I am checking out Tampa-Laptops again. I'd recommend this computer to anyone except gamers (who will need something a bit faster with better graphics) but for a college student, high school student, or working stiff this is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: does everything I need
Reviews.Author: Janet Atkinson - Q15J
Reviews.Content: good sturdy reliable laptop will fit all my needs - got tired of the Android interface and quirks it carried

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Steve Grey "Steve Grey"
Reviews.Content: Nothing I have ever bought with the Dell  name on it has ever disappointed me. This was no exception. The packing was excellent, lightning fast, and the seller kept me informed. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: If you are a DIY techie.....
Reviews.Author: N. McArthur "MyTech"
Reviews.Content: Excellent prices on amazon.com, as always.  I was amazed when the indicator LEDs revealed the processor failed in my Dell.  I was shocked when I checked Dell.com for a replacement.  I was indescribably pleased when I found the part  and its price on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Clean, Fast, Display White is Still White
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this from Tampa-Laptops, despite a bad review or two. It was indeed shipped USPS but arrived in fine condition, started right up, saw my wifi and was ready to go. (I'd give it 5 stars except it came preloaded with a remote access desktop sharing program that just smelled funny to my overly suspicious mind.) I had confirmed in earlier email support that it arrived with a restore disc, so I formatted the drive and reinstalled Windows XP, then spent the next day downloading drivers and software, AVG, Firefox, CCleaner, File Shredder, Everyday Auto Backup, etc., customizing the laptop to my specs. I plan to give this as a gift for a friend, so am making sure it's perfect when THEY open the box.

Reviews.Title: RJ/Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: R.J.
Reviews.Content: Laptop arrived promptly. Looked almost brand new. Operates well...definetly worth the price if you want a nice lap top. Plan to purchase another!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: L. Fitzgerald "lb128f"
Reviews.Content: The Dell Latitude Laptop is a perfect fit for my son. He needed something to use at College and this works! Nice size, clean, dependable!

Reviews.Title: Dell latitude
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I bought the cheapest one available. I bought this specific model to replace my wifes work computer. What I received had twice the ram listed, three times the hard drive space, an upgraded processor and win7. Thanks seller j-tech :)

Reviews.Title: not bad at all, battery pretty much junk
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: laptop came in excellent condition and works fine. only reason i give 4 stars is battery runs down in 15 min. so you pretty much cant leave a plug in.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2GHz
512MB DDR2 RAM
80GB Hard Drive
14.1-Inch Screen, Intel GMA X3100
Windows XP Professional
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Latitude D630 14.1" Laptop (2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Processor, 2 GB RAM, 80 GB Hard Drive, DVD Player, Windows XP Professional)
